thread.title: Livia Firth unites Commonwealth with fashion

title: Livia Firth unites Commonwealth with fashion
text:
Livia Firth unites Commonwealth with fashion 6:21pm GMT - 01:45 
The Commonwealth Fashion Exchange pairs designers with artisan producers from 52 countries for a sustainable fashion extravaganza. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The Commonwealth Fashion Exchange pairs designers with artisan producers from 52 countries for a sustainable fashion extravaganza. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2DX3mRh
